blog.description: I'm Dave (he/him). I'm a fan of Andi Mack, Riverdale, and Girl Meets World, and other shows and movies. Feel free to send me asks!

summary: do we have any idea of what's happening in 3x16? i feel like that's the ep i've heard the least about.
question: do we have any idea of what's happening in 3x16? i feel like that's the ep i've heard the least about.
answer:
It is the ep we know the least about for sure but we also don’t know much about 3x15 either so I’ll use this ask to talk about them both. We know in 3x15 that there’s a Tyrus and Kira C plot involving basketball at the park but I’m pretty sure that’s largely walled off from the A and B plots in that ep. It seems that the main kids have scenes at the Spoon and at least some of them bike to another location where there was a sign for a cultural festival but whose culture is unknown. There’s also a middle aged woman named Vivian in this ep but who knows who she’s there for, maybe Celia since she’s also in this ep? 

There’s an officer Penn in 3x15 that we’ve known about for a while and we have no idea what he’s there for. I don’t think he’ll be involved with TJ at all, given that TJ was supposed to disappear until 3x19, I don’t think they want us thinking too much about what he’s up to after this ep. That they’re using a white man for a cop makes me hope he’s not involved in a Buffy story line and since we know that Buffy gets a fair bit of plot in 3x14 it would be odd to give her another big plot. It would also be odd to involve just Cyrus with the cops again.

One possibly significant thing about 3x15 is that it was one of the two of the original eight eps left that Amber wasn’t in. In theory that frees up time in both Jonah and Andi’s story lines. Maybe this is this ep where Mrs. Beck appears? 3x15 is a good a guess as any for when she appears and for when the show begins turning back to romantic Jandi. We’re obviously not getting another gun plot but what exactly are the limits? Do all of the main kids get in trouble for something? Does Jonah get accused, rightly or wrongly, of shoplifting and that leads into further exploration of his family’s situation? Or does somebody commit an act of vandalism? Does someone try to run away? We really have little to work with unfortunately. 

All we know about 3x16 is that they filmed scenes at the school, the main kids spend some time go-karting, Amber is in this ep, and they seemed to do a bit of filming on some grassy area strewn with prop garbage. There’s a teenage girl named Kristina in this ep and a Mrs. Frankel who is probably a teacher. Maybe she’s an art teacher who inspires Andi to make an art piece which we know gets displayed in what was 3x17, or maybe she inspires Cyrus with his screenplay. Go karting sounds fun and is interesting with what we know of Jonah’s financial situation. Is the prop garbage what Andi uses to make her art piece, or is it for some volunteer thing, or the most cracked option, part of someones community service for whatever went down with the cop in 3x15? And we have no clue what Amber is being used for. 

Eps 15 and 16 are probably the last eps where the show really has the time left to focus on any really serious topics or introduce new things. From what we know of the original 3x17-3x21 eps it seems like the show starts turning to wrapping everything up from 3x17 onwards. Of course, the cut ep scrambles things somewhat and I wonder how many plots get shuffled around.

reblog.comment: Season 1, Episode 5, “It’s Not About You”

trail.content_raw: Season 1, Episode 5, “It’s Not About You”
trail.content: Season 1, Episode 5, “It’s Not About You”

body:
50 days of Andi Mack

Season 1 Episode 5: It’s not about you

  • Andi really had the audacity to come back downstairs to ask for the disco ball after getting into HUGE trouble with Ham and Cece
  • I agree with Andi, Buffy’s curly hair suits her better
  • Gus is just so damn cute!
  • I think Cyrus saying “Like whatever, no big deal, we’re friends” was when I first realised his crush on Jonah
  • OK, we can all agree that TJ has mad rapping skills, but Buffy literally started singing a made up couuntry song on the spot and it was good
  • That awkward handshake!!!
  • Bex looked so hurt when Andi said she didn’t want to hang out, it was actually painful to watch
  • Cyrus was asking Andi for fashion advice and she straight up ABANDONED him!
  • Ciris would have been such a cringy couple, omygod
  • How dare Amber diss Cyrus’ shoes?!!!
  • Cyrus has actually come a long way. He went from getting sick from a short carousel ride to being able to go on those big rides in 312 completely vomit free! (That we know of)
  • “Andi, this is not about you. Not everything is” Honestly me whenever Andi speaks
  • Will we ever get to see the good hair crew T-shirts?

summary: Do you ever think the fandom puts to much emphasis on the romantic ships?
question: Do you ever think the fandom puts to much emphasis on the romantic ships?
answer:
Definitely! I’ve talked a lot before about why I usually prefer platonic relationships in shows. Andi Mack is no different for me. With the exception of Tyrus, my favorite relationships on the show are all platonic. I think that in general, the idea of platonic love doesn’t get the appreciation and recognition it deserves - both in television and in real life. 

That being said, I think there is a reason that romantic ships are so important in the Andi Mack fandom, and that is because one very important element to this series is the representation and validation it provides for the audience. Most of the ships people care about are lgbt and there’s a reason for that. Especially when it comes to Tyrus, which is a groundbreaking relationship and obviously resonates a lot with the show’s audience. I can’t find it in myself to complain about the focus on romantic ships for this show. I just hope people are appreciating other elements of the series as well.

blog.title: Love9620
blog.description: Lola| 22 years old| Tyrus Shipper| Trans Woman| Disney Fan| Charmed Fan| Harry Potter Fan

body:
Love Like This~Andi Mack

Chapter Six

*The Week Before Morp.*

Me and Cyrus went looking as suits. While Lola, Andi and Buffy went Dress shopping.

“So Jonah what do you think about this one?” Cyrus asked. He was wearing a classic all black suit with a white shirt. “It’s nice Cy-Guy but, I don’t think it’s you..” I replied. “You’re right… I’m going to try on another one.” Cyrus said. “This isn’t going to turn into your bar mitzvah all over again is it?” I asked. “Hey! I can’t help it if it takes me a while to make up my mind.” Cyrus said. “You are so gay.” I said. Cyrus open the door a crack and poked his head out. “And proud of it.” Cyrus said as he snapped his fingers and closed the door. “I think I’ll just wear a Blue shirt and dress pants.” I said. “Dude, that’s lame! summary: Given how much of season three Tyrus is basically written like a fan fiction (muffin bets, swingset arguments, the bread,...
question: Given how much of season three Tyrus is basically written like a fan fiction (muffin bets, swingset arguments, the bread, couples costumes, "Teej") I'm genuinely expecting Buffy to play the role of oblivious dork matchmaker
answer: Even beyond the fact that this entire season has felt like fluffy fan fiction, I personally expect Buffy will be involved in the resolution of Tyrus’ storyline. It certainly makes sense based on the writing. Buffy was the first person to know about Cyrus being gay. Buffy was the the first person to meet TJ. Buffy introduced Cyrus and TJ. Buffy was the first person to meet Kira. The overlap in these four characters’ storylines is not a coincidence. I will be very shocked if Buffy doesn’t actively play a role in Tyrus making up or getting together.

body:
Andi mack oneshot

Cyrus watched the audience as they watched final moments of the play he hoped they enjoyed it he knows it’s a middle school play and he will be in high school next year but it’s his first play he directed, The Audience erupted in applause, Cyrus looked  at the audience and saw his friends, he also looked at the other audience members and he realized they were really happy with the play he directed, they really enjoyed it, the applause was real he thought it would be pity applause Cyrus couldn’t believe it the first  play he directed was a success he was extremely happy.

he went to go get his things so he could go meet up with the cast and crew for a  big post play dinner that the drama teacher was taking them on

In the middle of the meal the drama teacher stood up and spoke “First I would like to think everyone that worked on the play, specifically I want to thank Walker brodsky for painting the sets it looked incredible,I also want to thank Gus Franklin for being the lead actor, you did an amazing job Gus and I also want to thank Cyrus Goodman for directing the play, it went great so j would like to thank you all for the amazing effort you put forth today you should all be proud of the work you did today”

Cyrus got a text message from Andi

Andi: I know you are having that post dinner play with the cast and crew of your play, but me Jonah and Buffy wanted to invite you to the spoon for a little celebration Lunch tomorrow at Noon

Cyrus: Really?

Andi: of course, you directed your first play ever it’s a big deal

Cyrus: alright I’ll see you guys tomorrow at the spoon

Cyrus put his phone down and ate his meal

The next day Cyrus was at the spoon With Buffy, Andi and Jonah they were talking about the play

“Who knew Gus could act” Buffy said

“Yeah, he is an amazing actor” Cyrus stated

“Is it weird that seeing him act made me  a bit attracted to Gus?” Andi Asked

“I don’t think so I think it just means you are attracted to creative people, I mean you were attracted to Walker right? Jonah answered

"At the post play dinner Mrs. Carr took us on I saw some girls give Gus their number so you’re not the only one who finds actors attractive” Cyrus said

“Yeah I suppose so” Andi Answered

“So what did you guys think of the play? Cyrus asked everyone

"It was so amazing” Andi said

“Yeah, I mean you know I am not really  into Plays or anything like that but I really enjoyed it” Buffy stated

“Thank you so much guys” Cyrus said smiling

“You are welcome Cyrus” Andi and Buffy said at  the same time

“So, Jonah did you enjoy it?” Cyrus asked Jonah

“Uhh yeah it was…good” Jonah said

This made  Cyrus suspicious so he asked Jonah “did you enjoy the scene where my character gave a eulogy  at his father’s funeral?”

“Oh yeah it was so sad” Jonah replied

“I wasn’t Acting in the play, I was the director” Cyrus said

“Oh” Jonah said

“Were you  not paying attention?” Cyrus questioned

“Sorry I was distracted” Jonan answered

“I told you this was the first play I directed right?” Cyrus asked

“Yes” Jonah answered

“You know it is important to me right?” Cyrus asked

“I do” Jonah replied quietly

“So you knew that I was directing a play for the first time, you knew it was important to me, so what got you so distracted that you couldn’t pay attention for like 2 hours” Cyrus inquired

Jonah mumbled something

“Speak up Jonah I can’t hear you, what did you say” Cyrus asked

“I said, I was trying to figure out a way to ask you out”

Cyrus, Andi and Buffy were all shocked at this

“What?” Cyrus asked

“Yeah, I have been wanting to ask you out for a long time, I spent my time watching the play trying to think of a good way to ask you out”

Jonah stated

“And did you think of anything?” Cyrus asked

“No, I didn’t so it was basically pointless” Jonah said

“Why not just ask me right  now then?” Cyrus asked

Jonah was surprised at this “Are you sure?” He asked

“Yeah go ahead” Cyrus answered

“Alright fine, Cyrus do you want to go on a date tomorrow?” Jonah asked

There was silence for a few seconds before Cyrus replied with “I would love to go on a date with you”

“Really?” Jonah asked

Cyrus smiled and replied with “of course”

Jonah smiled back and asked “how about La Fourchette tomorrow at six PM then?”

“That sounds great” Cyrus replied

Cyrus, Jonah, Buffy and Andi continued having lunch

Cyrus put his phone down and ate his meal

The next day Cyrus was at the spoon With Buffy, Andi and Jonah they were talking about the play

“Who knew Gus could act” Buffy said

“Yeah, he is an amazing actor” Cyrus stated

“Is it weird that seeing him act made me  a bit attracted to Gus?” Andi Asked

“I don’t think so I think it just means you are attracted to creative people, I mean you were attracted to Walker right? Jonah answered

"At the post play dinner Mrs. Carr took us on I saw some girls give Gus their number so you’re not the only one who finds actors attractive” Cyrus said

“Yeah I suppose so” Andi Answered

“So what did you guys think of the play? Cyrus asked everyone

"It was so amazing” Andi said

“Yeah, I mean you know I am not really  into Plays or anything like that but I really enjoyed it” Buffy stated

“Thank you so much guys” Cyrus said smiling

“You are welcome Cyrus” Andi and Buffy said at  the same time

“So, Jonah did you enjoy it?” Cyrus asked Jonah

“Uhh yeah it was…good” Jonah said

This made  Cyrus suspicious so he asked Jonah “did you enjoy the scene where my character gave a eulogy  at his father’s funeral?”

“Oh yeah it was so sad” Jonah replied

“I wasn’t Acting in the play, I was the director” Cyrus said

“Oh” Jonah said

“Were you  not paying attention?” Cyrus questioned

“Sorry I was distracted” Jonan answered

“I told you this was the first play I directed right?” Cyrus asked

“Yes” Jonah answered

“You know it is important to me right?” Cyrus asked

“I do” Jonah replied quietly

“So you knew that I was directing a play for the first time, you knew it was important to me, so what got you so distracted that you couldn’t pay attention for like 2 hours” Cyrus inquired

Jonah mumbled something

“Speak up Jonah I can’t hear you, what did you say” Cyrus asked

“I said, I was trying to figure out a way to ask you out”

Cyrus, Andi and Buffy were all shocked at this

“What?” Cyrus asked

“Yeah, I have been wanting to ask you out for a long time, I spent my time watching the play trying to think of a good way to ask you out”

Jonah stated

“And did you think of anything?” Cyrus asked

“No, I didn’t so it was basically pointless” Jonah said

“Why not just ask me right  now then?” Cyrus asked

Jonah was surprised at this “Are you sure?” He asked

“Yeah go ahead” Cyrus answered

“Alright fine, Cyrus do you want to go on a date tomorrow?” Jonah asked

There was silence for a few seconds before Cyrus replied with “I would love to go on a date with you”

“Really?” Jonah asked

Cyrus smiled and replied with “of course”

Jonah smiled back and asked “how about La Fourchette tomorrow at six PM then?”

“That sounds great” Cyrus replied

Cyrus, Jonah, Buffy and Andi continued having lunch

body:
Love Like This~Andi Mack

Chapter Five

I was sitting alone at home. Wondering when would be the perfect time to ask Lola Swan to be my girlfriend when I got a phone call from Amber asking me if I wanted to go see movie with her seeing as Tj was out on a date and she didn’t want to be home alone. I couldn’t say no because we are friends and I wanted to get out of the house myself.

*Time Skip*

*At The Movies*

I saw Tj and Cyrus standing my the Theater entrance for Aladdin. “Oh boy don’t tell me we are all going to see the same movie.” I said as I walked closer to Cyrus.“ Tj looked upset but then saw that I was with Amber. "Are you dating my sister again?” Tj asked. “Nope we are just going as friends.” Amber replied. “Oh ok.” Tj said. As we entered the movie theater I saw Lola sitting with her brother and who I assumed was their mother. “Oh no Lola’s here…” I wispered. “Dude what’s the big deal.. she already said yes to going to Morp with you.” Cyrus said. “Umm. Have you noticed that I’m with Amber… What if she gets the wrong idea?!?. I said as I started to panic. "Tj find us a seat I’ll be there in a minute.” Cyrus said. “Ok Underdog.” Tj said. “Jonah you need to calm down… Amber take my cup, dump out the soda and get some water.” Cyrus said. “Ok.” Amber said as she took Cyrus’s cup. “Jonah you need to beath… Everything will be alright.. I’m here.” Cyrus said trying to calm me down. Just then Lola walked around the corner. “Jonah, are you having another panic attack?” Lola asked. I nodded as Lola walked closer. “Jonah remember this will end.. they always do.” Lola said. Just then Amber came back with the water. “Here Jonah… this will help.” Amber said as she gave me the cup. After a while my panic attack was over. “Thanks guys but now we missed most of the movie.” I said. “Actually we haven’t… We just missed the preview’s.” Amber said. “Oh good! I gotta get back to my date.” Cyrus said as he walked over to Tj. “So.. you’re Lola.” Amber said. “Yep that’s me.” Lola replied. “I just remembered I have to work at the spoon in a few minutes.” Amber said. “Lola can you sit with Jonah?” Amber asked. “I’m actually here with..” but before Lola could finish Amber had left. “It’s ok you don’t have to sit with me.” I said. “Who said I didn’t want you to sit with me?” Lola asked. “Really?” I asked back. “Really.. besides… I think my mom wants to know the friend who is taking me to Morp.” Lola said. The word Friend wounded me… I never knew that just being called a friend could hurt. “Yeah Friend.” I said under my breath.
